title: Clarification of a unique mucosal vaccination route for improved systemic and mucosal immune response in broiler
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Rupa Akter, Md Abdul Masum, Subrato Biswas, Md Zahir Uddin Rubel, Sujan Kumar Sarkar, Mohammad Saiful Islam, Hossain M. Golbar, Md Emtiaj Alam, Md Abdur Rakib, Md Zahirul Isalm Khan
